ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Steps up to the bar
ygData.msgSnippet: Agreed!!!! Jen, you have just seen your last day of dirty deeds my dear. I pity you and your ways, your fun has ended, hope it was worth it. Melefante
ygData.messageBody:
Agreed!!!!
Jen, you have just seen your last day of dirty deeds my dear.
I pity you and your ways, your fun has ended, hope it was worth it.
Melefante
tundrawyrm wrote:/emote drops 50cp in the cigar box.
/emote steps up to to the line and slams his drink.
/emote throws the thick glass against the brick of the fireplace
/say To the TheEverquetTavern, and the other 30 pubs on the way from
Paineel to Katta.

I deleted the orginial posting by Jen but if someone has it still you
may point it out to abuse.yahoo.com per the terms of conduct at
bottom of each email sent to the yahoogroups.com This is the second
in the last two months by this Jen and most likly to other groups
also.
Ack I sound like a EQ guide( I am not)
but I am sure we all Play nicely(even the Zek servers). So the
next time you step up to the bar ingame toast one to The EverQuest
Tavern.
you can Hail me as Frostdragon at General chat ingame.
